data.scheme_name: Rajasthan Investment Promotion Scheme 2024 - Capability Development - New
data.benefits: Scheme provides 50% of the total cost of employee training for 6 months, max. up to Rs 0.40 lakhs per month.
data.eligibility: All MSME units are eligible under the scheme.
data.conditions: The enterprise needs to commence commercial production or operation during the operative period of the Policy unless otherwise specified in the Policy.
data.beneficiaries: All MSME units are eligible under the scheme.
data.prerequisites: The enterprise needs to commence commercial production or operation during the operative period of the Policy unless otherwise specified in the Policy
data.nodal_agency: Department Of Industries, Rajasthan Financial Corporation (RFC)
data.context: To promote Rajasthan as a preferred investment and innovation destination for global investors with a thriving ecosystem enabling economic growth and employment opportunities.
data.objective:
1. The goal is to achieve an annual growth rate of 15% in both manufacturing and services, while concurrently fostering balanced and inclusive regional development by uplifting industrially underdeveloped areas. 
  2. Additionally, there's an objective to create employment opportunities for 10 lakh people by 2027, attain leadership in sunrise sectors like green hydrogen, alternative energy, and medical devices, and become a pioneer in climate and sustainability by incentivizing green initiatives.
data.description:
MSMEs shall be eligible for reimbursement of 50% of the total cost of employee training for 6 months, as a one-time incentive up to:

  1. Rs 20,000/- per month for Micro units.
  2. Rs 30,000/- per month for Small units.
  3. Rs 40,000/- per month for Medium units
data.how_to_apply: RajNivesh portal provides a single point digital interface along with time bound clearances
data.funding_facilitator: Department Of Industries, Rajasthan Financial Corporation (RFC)
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get incentive after the approval of the application by the concerned authority.
data.additional_info: MSME incentives capped at INR 5 Cr annually.
data.checklist_info_a:
1.Copy of Udyam Registration Certificate (URC)
2. Certificate of Incorporation/ Partnership deed/Partnership registration/ Co- operative society registration. 
3.KYC Details
data.checklist_info_d: Bureau of Investment Promotion,Udyog Bhawan, Tilak Marg, Jaipur, Rajasthan, INDIA, +91-141-2227899, bip.raj@nic.in
data.beneficiary: Specific Industry - All Entities - Rajasthan - All MSMEs
